reviewText: PBS Nature animal programs are the best! Even though I've owned BOTH cats AND dogs all my life I ALWAYS learn more from these programs and purchase often.
Disappointed. Wanted to use with my fourth grade students, but not appropriate.
Everyone has loved this Nature special!

A thoughtfully laid out and entertaining video.  My husband and I enjoyed it immensely.  I'd recommend it for children and adults, even for those who don't have pets (yet).  I'll be watching my copy again soon.
This was a really cute and very informative video about cats and dogs. However, it was very "new agey"; but, we enjoyed it because we love cats and dogs.
I like all this documentary because it examines why some people are either dog people, cat people, or both and how this affects their lifestyles and choices.
Nice DVD if you like cats and dogs
AN EXCELLENT AND MOVING PICTURE OF HOW ANIMALS SHOW LOVE AND COMPASSION FOR THEIR COMPANIONS.  I BELIEVE THEY  ARE THE REAL MASTERS AND THEY OUR MASTERS.
i saw this program on PBS last night and I fell in love! a must have for those who share a life and love their pet!
Pleasant but less science than most programs in the Nature series.  But fun for those of us who love dogs and cats.
